sqlMap.select: select notice_no as no, notice_post_no as postNo, notice_send_emp_no as sendEmpNo, notice_receive_emp_no as receiveEmpNo, notice_content as content, notice_reading_status as readingStatus, notice_deleted as deleted, notice_created_date as createdDate, notice_updated_date as updatedDate, notice_deleted_date as deletedDate from comm_post_notices where notice_receive_emp_no = #value#

select post_no as no, post_board_no as boardNo, post_title as title, post_writer_no as writerNo, post_content as content, post_important as important, post_read_count as readCount, post_suggestion_count as suggestionCount, post_comment_count as commentCount, post_deleted as deleted, post_created_date as createdDate, post_updated_date as updatedDate, post_deleted_date as deletedDate, post_original_no as originalNo from comm_posts where post_writer_no = #value#

select comment_no as no, comment_emp_no as empNo, comment_content as content, comment_deleted as deleted, comment_created_date as createdDate, comment_updated_date as updatedDate, comment_deleted_date as deletedDate, comment_post_no as postNo from comm_post_comments where comment_emp_no = #value#
select count(*) from comm_posts where emp_no = #value# and post_deleted = 'N'
select count(*) from comm_post_notices where notice_receive_emp_no = #value# and notice_reading_status = 'N' and notice_deleted = 'N'
select count(*) from comm_post_comments where comment_emp_no = #value# and comment_deleted = 'N'

select e.emp_no as empNo, e.emp_created_date as createdDate, d.department_name as deptName, p.position_name as positionName, e.emp_name as name, e.emp_phone as phone, e.emp_email as email from comm_employees e, comm_departments d, comm_positions p where e.emp_dept_no = d.department_no and e.emp_position_no = p.position_no and emp_no = #value#
